#summary OpenPGM 3 : C Reference : Environment : pgm_supported()
#labels Phase-Implementation
#sidebar TOC3CReferenceEnvironment
_Function_
=== Declaration ===
<pre>
#include <pgm/pgm.h>

bool *pgm_supported*(void);
</pre>

=== Purpose ===
Check whether PGM engine initiated.

=== Return Value ===
Returns <tt>true</tt> if PGM engine is initialized, returns <tt>false</tt> if it is not.
